task.title: Adding an attachment
task.shortdesc: Add attachments to your cards to provide additional information or to keep information from different sources together in one place.

context.p: To add an attachment to a card, perform the following actions:

step.cmd: Click the card to which you would like to add an attachment.
In the ADD TO CARD area, click Attachment.
In the Attach From... panel, select the location of the attachment you wish to add.
